snippet.title: The Milky Way in X-rays for an outside observer : Log(N)-Log(S) and Luminosity Function of X-ray binaries from RXTE\/ASM data
snippet.description: The Milky Way in X-rays for an outside observer : Log(N)-Log(S) and Luminosity Function of X-ray binaries from RXTE\/ASM data / Grimm, H J ; Gilfanov, M ; Sunyaev, R A We study the Log(N)-Log(S) and X-ray luminosity function in the 2-10 keV energy band, and the spatial (3-D) distribution of bright, log(L_X) > 34-35 erg/s, X-ray binaries in the Milky Way. In agreement with theoretical expectations and earlier results we found significant differences between the spatial distributions of low (LMXB) and high (HMXB) mass X-ray binaries. [...] astro-ph/0109239.- 2002 - 21 p. \- Published in : Astron. Astrophys. 391 (2002) 923-944 Access to fulltext document: PDF; External link: astro-ph/0109239 PDF
